board = [[' ', ' ', 'C'], ['Z', ' ', ' '], [' ', ' ', 'Z']]
a_test = A_Star(board, vision=2, carrots=2, MaxLastMovements=2)
carrots_coordinates = a_test.carrots_in_sight(current_state=[0, 2], board=board
    )
a_test.open = [[0, 1], [1, 2]]
h = a_test.h_with_carrots(carrots_coordinates, current=[0, 2])
assert h == [3, 1]
